title: PostgreSQL Select Data

metadata.description: Learn about PostgreSQL Select Data with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Select Data
To retrieve data from a data base, we use the
SELECT
statement.
Specify Columns
By specifying the column names, we can choose which columns to select:
Example
SELECT 
          customer_name, country FROM customers;
Run Example »
Return ALL Columns
Specify a
*
instead of the column names to select
all
columns:
Example
SELECT * FROM customers;
Run Example »

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers PostgreSQL Select Data concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PostgreSQL Select Data effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PostgreSQL Select Data and how to apply it in your projects.
